content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to current news and events. However, in general, engineers may have concerns regarding the location or the impact of a hotel near Niagara Falls. The construction of a hotel could lead to increased human activity and could potentially harm the natural environment around the falls. Engineers and environmentalists may have to work together to assess the risks and come up with solutions to minimize the impact of the hotel on the falls while also considering the potential benefits to the local economy. Ultimately, the decision to build a hotel would depend on various factors, including environmental impact studies, local regulations, and community input.
